analysis.summary: The field 'September date' appears to be a date field for tracking completion or milestone dates in September 2025, likely for project or task management purposes.
insights: Field type is clearly 'date' based on explicit naming convention
The 'date_completion' type hint confirms this is for tracking completion dates
September 2025 context suggests this is for future planning/scheduling
No party specification indicates this is a general-purpose date field rather than party-specific
recommendations: Implement as a date field with calendar picker for user convenience
Set validation to accept only dates in September 2025 (09/01/2025 - 09/30/2025)
Use format MM/DD/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD for consistency
Mark as medium priority since it's a specific month tracking field
Consider adding a tooltip explaining this field tracks September 2025 completion dates
